pages.text:
START Group Events REVOLUTION SLIDER 6.7.35
END REVOLUTION SLIDER
Group Events
River Lanes Family Entertainment Center prides itself on planning many different types of events throughout the year with an unparalleled level of service. Our Events Coordinator works specifically with you to manage and execute on every detail. The Family Entertainment Center boasts 32 lanes, arcade and redemption center, billiards, private banquet room, full-service food and beverage menu and a professional staff ready to make your event a memorable one. We can handle groups from 10 to 200 – please click on the various event tabs above and know that we’re your premier destination for family entertainment, food and fun!
If you know what you want to book right now, call us at
321-267-7118
#2 or click on the EVENT REQUEST below and we will get back to you ASAP.  Please note that if you are within 48 hours of your event date, please call the bowling center directly.
Corporate Events
Fundraisers
Holiday Parties
Birthday Parties
Group Functions
There are many reasons WHY River Lanes Family Entertainment Center – but if you are trying to convince your CFO…
It’s affordable – we have lots of party packages at reasonable rates
It’s a great social activity – meaning everyone can participate and you don’t have to be good to have fun!
Bowling is family friendly so it gives you the option to open up the invite to kids and spouses
For folks that do not want to bowl, we have other activities for them to enjoy (arcade games, billiards, sports bar and more)
We make planning easy – there are lots of options and we can also create a custom event
Event times are available day or night, rain or shine (bowling is a great back-up plan when weather does not cooperate)
We provide all the necessary equipment – all you have to do is show up!
Great opportunity to give back to the people that are committed to your organization
It’s amazing how a small thank-you to your employees, such as offering an interactive bowling party can improve morale, productivity and loyalty. River Lanes has a lot of experience hosting and facilitating company parties throughout the year.
River Lanes can help with planning, cadence of activity, food options and desired result of the party. You have the option to rent the entire center or just what you need based on the size and desire of function. Call us now at
321-267-7118
#2 to book your corporate event or click on the EVENT REQUEST link below to request online and we will get back to you ASAP.
For years, River Lanes Family Entertainment Center has provided fundraising guidance to organizations both large and small. Our professional and experienced staff will review the variety of fundraising programs we have available and help you select the one that is right for you.
So if you are fundraising for schools, someone in need, sports teams, churches, charities, etc., there are all kinds of ways to bring people together to raise money. Below is our most popular fundraising event:
Bowl-A-Thon: this event is very straight forward and probably the most convenient option when it comes to raising money. Participants are charged a flat fee (determined by you and River Lanes) to attend your fundraising party and a percentage of each fee collected is donated to the fundraiser. This method is ideal for raising small amounts of money in a short period of time. In addition, the bowlers participating or the group executing the fundraiser solicit local businesses in an effort to sell advertisement banners. River Lanes determines the cost of the advertisement and receives a nominal fee for the creation and delivery of these banners which hang in the center for 30 days.
Because of our vast experience with Fundraisers, we encourage you to reach out to us while planning your event so we can assist you with any questions you may have and to provide you with a sample packet that will aid you in the creation of your event. In terms of maximum capacity, our Family Entertainment Center can accommodate up to 200 people – and with 32 bowling lanes, an expansive arcade, billiards, redemption center, private banquet room and the River City Bar and Grill, we are well positioned to make your fundraiser a complete success!
Call us now at
321-267-7118
#2 to book your fundraiser or click on the EVENT REQUEST link below to request online and and we will get back to you ASAP.
River Lanes Family Entertainment Center is in demand during the Holidays. Whether your organization is large or small, River Lanes Family Entertainment Center has the spacious venue to host a variety of Holiday parties. Because we have so many requests around the Holidays, we ask that you book as early as you can – as dates fill up quick.
Options to consider:
Rent the entire center (includes use of bowling, arcade games, billiards, unlimited soda, coffee and tea for the duration of the event, open bar option, etc.)
Rent a portion of the center
Value packages that can include or break out private banquet room, bowling, arcade/redemption, billiards as well as food and drink combinations
Call us now at
321-267-7118
#2 to book your fundraiser or click on the EVENT REQUEST link below to request online and we will get back to you ASAP.
The below Birthday Party packages are for Kids only. At River Lanes Family Entertainment Center, we understand that birthday parties are a lot of work; picking a birthday location, theme, sending out party invitations, decorations, food prep, entertainment for the party and finally the aftermath! Here’s an idea…let River Lanes Family Entertainment Center EXECUTE on all that work – you sit back and relax!
Visit our Birthday Parties Tab for more info.
River Lanes Family Entertainment Center prides itself on planning many different types of events throughout the year with an unparalleled level of service. Our Events Coordinator works specifically with you to manage and execute on every detail. The Family Entertainment Center boasts 32 lanes, arcade and redemption center, billiards, private banquet room, full-service food and beverage menu and a professional staff ready to make your event a memorable one.
There are many reasons WHY River Lanes Family Entertainment Center is the right venue for your next group function…
It’s affordable – we have lots of group packages at reasonable rates
It’s a great social activity and you don’t have to be good to have fun!
Our Bowling Center is family friendly – so safe for the little ones if you need to bring them
For folks that do not want to bowl, we have other activities for them to enjoy (arcade games, billiards, sports bar and more)
We can handle groups from 10 to 200 – call us now at
321-267-7118
#2 to book your group function or click on the EVENT REQUEST link below and we will get back to you ASAP.
Event Request
Earwax buildup can lead to discomfort, hearing loss, and even infections. While there are many over-the-counter solutions available, some prefer to seek out more natural methods. Delving into the Best Natural Remedies for Earwax Removal offers a range of gentle yet effective ways to address this common concern without resorting to harsh chemicals or invasive procedures.
https://bluegrassentclinic.com/best-natural-remedies-for-earwax-removal/
Men around the world who face the challenges of erectile dysfunction are now seeking comprehensive and effective Erectile Dysfunction Treatments, leading to a significant increase in the availability and diversity of options designed to improve sexual health and restore confidence.
https://monumentmedicalclinic.com/
The realm of erectile dysfunction treatments offers a multitude of choices, but for those prioritizing rapid action combined with enduring efficacy, Cialis Super Active often emerges as the top recommendation. Its advanced composition ensures an optimal balance between immediate impact and sustained relief.
end article section

START Food & Spirits REVOLUTION SLIDER 6.7.35
END REVOLUTION SLIDER
About Us
Live Entertainment
Food Specials
Group Parties
Menu
River Lanes Family Entertainment Center is one of the finest Family owned bowling centers in the country. We purchased the Center in 1986 with the vision to become the number one Family Entertainment Center (FEC) destination in Brevard County. The Center is currently managed by second and third generation family members.
Our mission is to provide an experience that exceeds your expectations every-time you walk into the Center. The Center provides state of the art equipment, quality activities and events along with exceptional service and personal attention to our Customers. One of our core mission objectives is to not treat you like a Customer, but as if you are part of the family.
In 2005, we made the decision to re-invest and expand the FEC in order to better accommodate our Customers. Fast forward 18 months, River Lanes Family Entertainment Center re-launched – adding over 10,000 SQ FT, 8 boutique lanes, River City Bar and Grill (a full service 110 seat restaurant), banquet room that will accommodate 65 guests comfortably and a complete overhaul on the interior and exterior of the FEC.
After launching River City Bar and Grill, we have taken great pride in developing a menu that combines traditional and American food that accommodate both Families that are coming in for just a meal, or those that want to come in to bowl and eat. Our unique list of menu items includes homemade soups, the best wings and proprietary sauces in Brevard County, traditional and gourmet pizzas, fresh salads, monthly plated specials and more.
Your bowling scores not going as planned? Take a break and take advantage of
Happy
Hour
, Monday through Friday 3pm to 6pm. Enjoy one of our domestic, IPA or expanding craft beer selections while watching the game in our renovated River City Sports Bar. Featuring 10 high definition flat screens, this interactive sports bar also includes the NFL and MLB ticket games, SEC Network, Big Ten Network, live entertainment and billiards. Either way, you’ll feel much better about that bowling score!
Come on in and enjoy the FEC – we look forward to exceeding your expectations and providing an experience that keeps you coming back!
River City Sports Bar is your home for the coldest drafts, tastiest wings, traditional and gourmet pizzas, homemade soups, fresh salads, and the juiciest burgers in Titusville. Featuring 10 high definition flat screen TV’s, this interactive sports bar also includes live entertainment, billiards, and games.
Happy Hour
Happy Hour
every Tuesday through Friday 3pm to 6pm
At River City Bar and Grill we cherish your feedback – so for all of those who let us know what they want on the menu, we provide a “Monthly Special” that includes some of your favorite dishes! Thank you to all of our Customers for dining with us. Check out our River City Bar & Grill Facebook page for our monthly specials.
River Lanes Family Entertainment Center is the perfect venue for your next team building event, holiday party, corporate event or group gathering. With 32 lanes, arcade, redemption center, billiards, a full-service restaurant and bar, private party/banquet room (seats up to 65 comfortably) and an experienced staff – we can handle groups from 15 to 200 and we’re ready to make your event a memorable one!
Fill out the Event Request Form to the right or call us now at
321-267-7118
#2 to book your event today – you’ll find we’re your premier destination for family entertainment, food and fun!
Appetizers
Mozzarella Sticks
Six cheese sticks served with marinara sauce
River City Wings
Cooked until they are tender & crispy then tossed in any of our famous specialty sauces. Served with crisp celery and your choice of blue cheese or ranch
Onion Rings
Half pound of battered, deep fried onion rings served with choice of sauce
Egg Roll of the Day
Ask about today’s option
Fried Mushrooms
Breaded whole button mushrooms served with horsey sauce
Nacho Grande
Nacho chips piled high with chili, cheese, lettuce, black olives, salsa, jalapeno peppers and sour cream
Fried Green Beans
Battered green beans served with Wasabi ranch
Fried Pickle Spears
Six breaded dill pickle spears served with chipotle sauce
River City Tenders
Four (4) crispy chicken tenders served with fries or homemade chips and your choice of two sauces
Burgers and Sandwiches
BYO Burger
A 7oz Angus beef burger served any way you like it
Sliders
Two 2oz Angus burgers topped with American cheese, lettuce and tomato or two pulled pork sliders with sweet sauce
Patty Melt
6oz Angus burger with grilled onions and Swiss cheese on marble rye
The Big Dog
A 1/4lb all beef hotdog served with your favorite toppings
River City Philly
Sliced sirloin or marinated chicken breast grilled with onions, bell peppers and mushrooms then topped with melted provolone cheese
Sandwiches
Ultimate BLT
White toast stacked with bacon, lettuce, tomato and mayonnaise
Fried Pork Tenderloin
Center cut of pork loin, lightly seasoned and served with grilled onions and your choice of sauce
Cuban Sandwich
Sliced ham and pork with Swiss cheese
Pulled Pork Sandwich
Slow cooked pulled pork served with sweet BBQ sauce on a toasted
Ciabatta Club
Turkey, ham, bacon, Swiss cheese with lettuce, tomato and chipotle mayo stacked high on ciabatta bread
Chicken Sandwich
6oz grilled or fried chicken breast whichever way you like
Egg Salad Sandwich
River City’s homemade recipe on your choice of bread
Blackened Mahi Sandwich
Blackened Mahi served on a Kaiser bun with lettuce, tomato and tarter
Chicken Salad Sandwich
Slow cooked all white meat chicken in this homemade recipe
Reuben
Sliced corned beef topped with Swiss cheese, sauerkraut and Thousand Island dressing served on marble rye
Wraps and More
Chicken Wrap
Grilled or fried chicken breast served with lettuce, tomato, onion and your choice of cheese and choice of sauce
Chicken Caesar Wrap
All the fixings of a chicken Caesar salad wrapped in a warm flour tortilla
Fried Chicken BLT Wrap
Fried chicken and bacon served with lettuce, tomato, onion and your choice of cheese and choice of sauce
Vegetarian Wrap
Loaded with grilled onions, mushrooms, green peppers, fresh tomatoes and lettuce then topped with melted mozzarella cheese and chipotle sauce
Quesadillas
Made with salsa, tomatoes, onions, and cheese, add grilled chicken or sirloin steak
Pizzas and Salads
River City Meaty Pizza
Pepperoni, sausage, ham, bacon and mozzarella cheese
River City House Salad
Iceberg and romaine blend, boiled egg, cheddar jack cheese, tomato, cucumbers and red onion and served with your choice of  protein and dressing
Buffalo Chicken Pizza
Topped with our chicken tenders dipped in our famous buffalo sauce, bleu cheese crumbles, mozzarella cheese and drizzled with ranch dressing
Wedge Salad
Quarter head iceberg with bleu cheese crumbles, bacon, tomato and bleu cheese dressing
Supreme Pizza
Loaded with onion, bell peppers, mushrooms, black olives, pepperoni and sausage
Chicken Caesar Salad
Grilled chicken on a bed of romaine tossed with our Caesar dressing and topped with parmesan cheese and seasoned croutons
Make It Your Own Pizza
Our fresh pressed pizza dough any way you like it. 8in, 12in, and 16in sizes available
Greek Salad
A mixture of iceberg and romaine loaded with cucumbers, feta, Greek olives, red onions and tomatoes tossed in an Aegean dressing
Tomato Blossom Salad
A blooming tomato stuffed with your choice of egg, tuna or chicken salad.
Event Request
*Select Occasion
Corporate Events
Banquet Room
Team Building
Fundraisers
Holiday Parties
Group Functions
Δ
In our fast-paced world, stress and unhealthy lifestyles contribute to the escalating rates of high blood pressure. But by employing the Best Hypertension Management Techniques, one can significantly reduce risks and lead a healthier, more balanced life.
https://bestlasikphoenix.com/the-best-hypertension-management-techniques/
Many individuals often seek quick fixes to health issues, but when it comes to high blood pressure, understanding the Best Hypertension Management Techniques can pave the way for long-term health and wellness. It’s essential to approach the condition holistically, balancing medication with lifestyle changes.
